===Etymology===
From [[小]] ("small") + [[豆]] ("bean")
* see [[義訓]], ''gikun''

===Pronunciation===
* {{audio|Ja-Adzuki.oga|Audio|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|アズキ}}

# [[azuki bean]]

====Compounds====
* [[小豆粥]] (''azukigayu''): rice gruel with adzuki beans
* [[小豆象虫]] (''azuki zōmushi''): adzuki bean weevil
* [[小豆色]] (''azukiiro''): reddish-brown
* [[小豆鱒]] (''azukimasu''): rock cod
